mean_cn: adj. 多管闲事的，非官方的
mean_en: used to describe an annoying person who tries to tell other people what to do in a way that is not wanted or needed
short_phrase: an officious announcer with a megaphone
sentence: That officious announcer is always interrupting the music with some announcement.
sentence_trans: 那个多管闲事的宣告者总是用一些通告来打断音乐。
